targets.rawSql:
select time, count as "Ongoing flow count"
from ongoing_flow_count
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)

select time, 1 as "New model deployed"
from model_deployment
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)

SELECT
  DATE_BIN(INTERVAL $chunk_length_sec, to_timestamp(time::bigint + ($chunk_length_sec * 1000000000) / 1)) as bucket,
  SUM(CASE WHEN true_label = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / $chunk_length_sec AS "Started benign flows / sec"
FROM flow
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
GROUP BY bucket
ORDER BY bucket

SELECT
  DATE_BIN(INTERVAL $chunk_length_sec, to_timestamp(time::bigint + ($chunk_length_sec * 1000000000) / 1)) as bucket,
  SUM(CASE WHEN true_label = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / $chunk_length_sec AS "Started attack flows / sec"
FROM flow
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
GROUP BY bucket
ORDER BY bucket

SELECT
  DATE_BIN(INTERVAL $short_chunk_length_sec, to_timestamp(time::bigint + ($short_chunk_length_sec * 1000000000) / 1)) as bucket,
  AVG(CASE WHEN (predicted_label = true_label) or (predicted_label = 0 and true_label = 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "Accuracy"
FROM flow
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
GROUP BY bucket
ORDER BY bucket

SELECT
  AVG(CASE WHEN predicted_label = 2       AND true_label = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS pred_a_true_a,
  AVG(CASE WHEN predicted_label = 2       AND true_label = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS pred_a_true_b,
  AVG(CASE WHEN predicted_label IN (0, 1) AND true_label = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS pred_b_true_b,
  AVG(CASE WHEN predicted_label IN (0, 1) AND true_label = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS pred_b_true_a
FROM flow
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)

SELECT
  DATE_BIN(INTERVAL $short_chunk_length_sec, to_timestamp(time::bigint + ($short_chunk_length_sec * 1000000000) / 1)) as bucket,
  COUNT(*) AS "Total flow count"
FROM flow
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
GROUP BY bucket
ORDER BY bucket

WITH flow_buckets AS (
    SELECT
        date_bin(INTERVAL $chunk_length_sec, to_timestamp(time::bigint + ($chunk_length_sec * 1000000000) / 1)) as window,
        COUNT(*) AS flow_count
    FROM flow
    WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
    GROUP BY window
),
monitored_buckets AS (
    SELECT
        date_bin(INTERVAL $chunk_length_sec, to_timestamp(time::bigint + ($chunk_length_sec * 1000000000) / 2)) AS window,
        SUM(count) AS total_count
    FROM monitored_flow_count
    WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
    GROUP BY window
)
SELECT
    m.window,
    100.0 * m.total_count / f.flow_count AS "% of monitored flows"
FROM monitored_buckets m
INNER JOIN flow_buckets f ON m.window = f.window
WHERE m.window < (SELECT MAX(x.window) FROM monitored_buckets x)
  AND m.window < (SELECT MAX(x.window) FROM flow_buckets x)
  AND (100.0 * m.total_count / f.flow_count) > 0.1
  AND (100.0 * m.total_count / f.flow_count) < 20
ORDER BY m.window;

SELECT
  AVG(CASE WHEN (predicted_label = true_label) or (predicted_label = 0 and true_label = 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "Overall accuracy"
FROM flow
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)

WITH counts AS (
  SELECT
    SUM(CASE WHEN predicted_label = 2 AND true_label = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS tp,
    SUM(CASE WHEN predicted_label = 2 AND true_label IN (0, 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS fp,
    SUM(CASE WHEN predicted_label IN (0, 1) AND true_label = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS fn
  FROM flow
  WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
),
metrics AS (
  SELECT
    tp,
    fp,
    fn,
    CASE WHEN (tp + fp) > 0 THEN tp * 1.0 / (tp + fp) ELSE 0 END AS precision,
    CASE WHEN (tp + fn) > 0 THEN tp * 1.0 / (tp + fn) ELSE 0 END AS recall
  FROM counts
),
f1_calc AS (
  SELECT
    precision,
    recall,
    CASE
      WHEN (precision + recall) > 0
      THEN 2 * precision * recall / (precision + recall)
      ELSE 0
    END AS f1_score
  FROM metrics
)
SELECT f1_score as "Overall F1 score" FROM f1_calc

matcher.options: Actual F1 score of deployed models
Estimated F1 score of new model
Estimated F1 score of current model

targets.rawSql:
SELECT time, f1_score as 'Estimated F1 score of current model'
FROM time_window_score
WHERE type = 'current_estimate' AND $__timeFilter(time)
targets.refId: Estimated F1 score of current model

targets.rawSql:
SELECT time, f1_score as 'Estimated F1 score of new model'
FROM time_window_score
WHERE type = 'new_estimate' AND $__timeFilter(time)
targets.refId: Estimated F1 score of new model

targets.rawSql:
SELECT time, f1_score as 'Actual F1 score of deployed models'
FROM time_window_score
WHERE type = 'current_actual' AND $__timeFilter(time)
targets.refId: Actual F1 score of deployed models

targets.rawSql:
select to_timestamp(time::bigint - 100000000) as x, 0 as y
from model_deployment
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)

union

select time as x, 1 as y
from model_deployment
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)

union

select to_timestamp(end_time) as x, 1 as y
from model_deployment
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)

union

select to_timestamp(end_time + 100000000) as x, 0 as y
from model_deployment
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)

select to_timestamp(time::bigint + duration / 2), complexity as "Complexity of new model"
from model_deployment
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)

matcher.options: Actual F1 score of deployed models
Estimated F1 score of new model
Estimated F1 score of current model

targets.rawSql:

WHERE type = 'current_actual' AND $__timeFilter(time)

targets.rawSql:
select time, 1 as "New model deployed"
from model_deployment
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)

SELECT
  DATE_BIN(INTERVAL $chunk_length_sec, to_timestamp(time::bigint + ($chunk_length_sec * 1000000000) / 1)) as bucket,
  SUM(CASE WHEN true_label = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / $chunk_length_sec AS "Started benign flows / sec"

  DATE_BIN(INTERVAL $chunk_length_sec, to_timestamp(time::bigint + ($chunk_length_sec * 1000000000) / 1)) as bucket,
  SUM(CASE WHEN true_label = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / $chunk_length_sec AS "Started attack flows / sec"

  DATE_BIN(INTERVAL $short_chunk_length_sec, to_timestamp(time::bigint + ($chunk_length_sec * 1000000000) / 1)) as bucket,
  AVG(CASE WHEN (predicted_label = true_label) or (predicted_label = 0 and true_label = 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "Accuracy"

ORDER BY bucket

list.description: Sometimes data needs to be grouped into buckets. This specifies the length (time interval) of these buckets.
list.label: Chunk length (sec)
list.name: chunk_length_sec

list.description: Short version of the chunk length variable. Used for stuff requiring greater precision.
list.label: Short chunk length (sec)
list.name: short_chunk_length_sec
